summary.span: 命名空间包含一些定义所有对象所驻留的上下文的对象。

span.span: The namespace contains objects that define the contexts all objects reside within.

summary.span: 上下文是一个有序的属性序列，用于定义其中的对象所处的环境。

span.span: A context is an ordered sequence of properties that defines an environment for the objects within it.

summary.span: 上下文是在对象的激活过程中创建的，这些对象被配置为要求某些自动服务，如同步、事务、实时 (JIT) 激活、安全性等。

span.span: Contexts are created during the activation process for objects that are configured to require certain automatic services such synchronization, transactions, just-in-time (JIT) activation, security, and so on.

summary.span: 多个对象可以存留在一个上下文内。

span.span: Multiple objects can live inside a context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当创建新对象时的.net 就查找兼容上下文 Framework 或创建新的上下文对象。Whenever a new object is created, the.NET Framework finds a compatible context or creates a new context for the object. 对象放置到上下文中后，就会保持其整个生命周期。After an object is placed in a context, it stays in it for life. 可以绑定到上下文的类称为上下文绑定类。Classes that can be bound to a context are called context-bound classes. 当从另一个上下文访问，请使用代理直接引用这些上下文绑定类。When accessed from another context, these context-bound classes are referenced directly using a proxy. 从一个上下文中的对象到另一个上下文中的对象的调用将经过上下文代理，受由组合的上下文属性实现策略。A call from an object in one context to an object in another context will go through a context proxy and be affected by the policy implemented by the combined context properties.
